EmailTemplate.description: Answer Request for additional technical information on DuPont™ Nomex®
EmailTemplate.name: DPS- DuPont™ Nomex® Technical Guide
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® Technical Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®.
Attached you will find a link to a more comprehensive technical overview of the Nomex® products to support your request for technical information. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/assets/downloads/nomex/Nomex_Technical_Guide.pdf
Please continue to visit out DuPont websites which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
